education.degree: Master of Science in Software Engineering Systems
Bachelor’s of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering

experience.workDescription: Strengthened the security of World-Check Online and World-Check NextGen, leading the development of a Web Application Firewall (WAF) to protect against threats like Log4Shell and XSS, while transitioning the database to zero-trust IAM authentication for enhanced security and architecture. Leveraged cutting-edge technologies, including Micronaut in Java and AWS, to optimize the security and performance of database systems, achieving a 90% reduction in data purging time and enabling parallel processing of over 1000 records within a 15-minute timeout.

Collaborated in the development of Allstate Mobile, leveraging proficiency in Swift and Kotlin to enhance features, optimize application performance, and address critical bug fixes. Played a key role in improving Allstate Mobile’s functionality, ensuring a seamless user experience by implementing feature enhancements and bug fixes in both Swift and Kotlin.

Contributed to inhouse Citrix-Workplace product development, optimizing performance and reducing workspace initial load time by 45% through Go-lang. Took a leadership role by managing a team of interns in project execution for the Citrix-Workplace development.

projects.projectDescription: Founded and developed ”What’s You,” an all-in-one data privacy and education app aimed at increasing user awareness of online data exposure and data breach information. Developed app to address data transparency challenges, enabling users to manage online data privacy effectively.

Created Insider-Shibu to consolidate public insider company info, achieving a 37 Product Hunt ranking and integration with Watcher.guru. Managed cloud infrastructure, optimizing backend systems for efficiency and scalability.

Developed Sensibo GPT, a GPT-3 smart device that utilizes Sensibo APIs to intelligently control and adjust AC temperature and parameters based on temperature, humidity, and other factors, contributing to and merging with Sensibo API code.
Developed ”Nothing-X” as a bridge between the tech startup ’Nothing’ and the community, garnering a substantial following and achieving successful integration with the official forum.
